quote: “It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.”
author: André Gide

quote: “This life is what you make it. No matter what
author: you're going to mess up sometimes
about: it's a universal truth. But the good part is you get to decide how you're going to mess it up. Girls will be your friends - they'll act like it anyway. But just remember
column5: some go. The ones that stay with you through everything - they're your true best friends. Don't let go of them. Also remember
column6: sisters make the best friends in the world. As for lovers
column8: they'll come and go too. And baby
column10: most of them - actually pretty much all of them are going to break your heart
column11: but you can't give up because if you give up
column12: you'll never find your soulmate. You'll never find that half who makes you whole and that goes for everything. Just because you fail once
column13: doesn't mean you're gonna fail at everything. Keep trying
column20: sweetie? So keep your head high
column24: because life's a beautiful thing and there's so much to smile about.”
column27: friends heartbreak inspirational life love sisters

quote: “You may not be her first
author: her last
about: or her only. She loved before she may love again. But if she loves you now
related_tags: what else matters? She's not perfect—you aren't either
column5: and the two of you may never be perfect together but if she can make you laugh
column7: and admit to being human and making mistakes
column8: hold onto her and give her the most you can. She may not be thinking about you every second of the day
column9: but she will give you a part of her that she knows you can break—her heart. So don't hurt her
column11: don't analyze and don't expect more than she can give. Smile when she makes you happy
column12: let her know when she makes you mad
column13: and miss her when she's not there.”

quote: “The opposite of love is not hate
author: it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness
about: it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy
related_tags: it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death
column8: activism apathy hate indifference inspirational love opposite philosophy

quote: “It is not a lack of love
author: but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.”
column5: friendship lack-of-friendship lack-of-love love marriage unhappy-marriage

quote: “I love you without knowing how
author: or when
about: or from where. I love you simply
related_tags: without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this
column5: in which there is no I or you
column6: so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand
column7: so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close.”

quote: “If you can make a woman laugh
author: you can make her do anything.”

quote: “The real lover is the man who can thrill you by kissing your forehead or smiling into your eyes or just staring into space.”
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: “Love does not begin and end the way we seem to think it does. Love is a battle
author: love is a war; love is a growing up.”

quote: “There is nothing I would not do for those who are really my friends. I have no notion of loving people by halves
author: it is not my nature.”

quote: “To love at all is to be vulnerable. Love anything and your heart will be wrung and possibly broken. If you want to make sure of keeping it intact you must give it to no one
author: not even an animal. Wrap it carefully round with hobbies and little luxuries; avoid all entanglements. Lock it up safe in the casket or coffin of your selfishness. But in that casket
column7: it will change. It will not be broken; it will become unbreakable
column9: irredeemable. To love is to be vulnerable.”

quote: “If I had a flower for every time I thought of you...I could walk through my garden forever.”
author: Alfred Tennyson

quote: “A lady's imagination is very rapid; it jumps from admiration to love
author: from love to matrimony in a moment.”

quote: “To die will be an awfully big adventure.”
author: J.M. Barrie

quote: “Finish each day and be done with it. You have done what you could. Some blunders and absurdities no doubt crept in; forget them as soon as you can. Tomorrow is a new day. You shall begin it serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense.”
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
